review_text: This app has completely transformed how I manage my daily tasks. Super smooth and intuitive!
The app crashes every single time I try to upload a photo. Lost all my work. Very frustrated.
Love the app overall! Would be amazing if you could add a dark mode. My eyes hurt at night.
Battery drain is insane. My phone loses 30% charge in just one hour of using this app.
Absolutely fantastic! The customer support team helped me resolve my issue within minutes. 10/10.
Please add an option to export data as PDF or Excel. Would make this app perfect for work.
My account got hacked and all my personal data was exposed. This is a serious security issue!
The new update is incredibly fast. No more waiting around. Best app on my phone hands down.
Really helpful app! One suggestion - please add fingerprint login. Would save so much time.
Videos refuse to load even on 5G connection. This is a persistent bug since the last update.
I recommended this app to my entire office. Everyone loves it. Keep up the great work team!
Charged me twice for the same subscription. Still waiting for a refund after 2 weeks. Unacceptable.
Great app! It would be even better if you added a calendar view to track events over time.
Seamless experience from start to finish. The UI is clean and everything works exactly as expected.
Notifications stopped working after the last update. I'm missing important alerts because of this bug.
This app saves me at least 2 hours every day. Cannot imagine going back to the old way of doing things.
Can you please add multi-language support? Many of my family members can't use it in English only.
The search function is completely broken. It returns random results that have nothing to do with my query.
Just discovered the offline mode feature - total game changer! Works perfectly without internet.
Very good app. Please add an option to customize the home screen layout. Would make it perfect.
Data sync is broken. I lost three days of work because it didn't back up properly. Heartbreaking.
The app keeps getting better with every update. The team clearly listens to user feedback. Love it!
Login takes forever - sometimes 2 to 3 minutes just to get in. This needs to be fixed urgently.
Would love a feature to share my progress reports directly to WhatsApp. That would be super useful.
Flawless performance and beautiful design. I've tried 10 similar apps and this is by far the best.
